skins.shipDescription: Cleveland-class light cruiser ®C Biloxi, Hull Number CL-80.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Eagle Union light cruiser Biloxi. I fought in heaps of battles and carried out many carrier escort missions. Sure, the Cleveland class has its hallmark anti-air fire, but everyone's gotta work together to win. So let's do just that, Commander.
skins.acquisition: I'm Biloxi. I hope we can work together and seize victory as fellow fleet members. Anyway, that's all for introductions. Nice meeting you.
skins.login: Mission status: all green. Eyes on the progress, Commander.
skins.details: Yeah? If you need any help, just say the word. My schedule's pretty packed too, but I can always squeeze in some time to take on your orders.
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Big sis"? Who, me? Ahh, you mean the lead ship. I respect Cleve just as a sister ship. Hahahah!
skins.secretaryIdle2: We *are* an improved model, but we didn't end up as carriers like Bataan, and our improvements aren't extensive enough to call us part of a subclass. The differences are more obvious through our looks and personalities, though.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A friend always deserves help, even if you yourself are in a tough spot. That's what "no man left behind" is all about. Ain't that right?
skins.secretaryTouch: Check out my gear. Nobody's got better AA than I do. You bet your butt it'll shoot down bogeys like back in the Turkey Shoot.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: One without manners is one garnering contempt. Is that really how you wanna be, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: We're celebrating an overseas holiday, hence my not-so-casual outfit today. Heheh, what do you think? Looking slick?
skins.acquisition: We're celebrating an overseas holiday, hence my not-so-casual outfit today. Heheh, what do you think? Looking slick?
skins.login: Where do you wanna go today, Commander? Don't worry, we don't have to rush it. I've got plenty of time to spare.
skins.details: A friend told me this look would totally steal your heart. So, has it? Are you head over heels for me? Hahahah! I'm just kidding with you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: These Dragon Empery signs are really unique, in a good way. I think they're fascinating.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The seat on this Manjuu cart is pretty small. I'd offer to share if there was more room.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I was just about to go procure some souvenirs. What would you buy if you were me, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Getting tired? Then let's catch a breather. Oh yeah, could you pour me some wine? Let's have a toast. To a wonderful day!

skins.shipDescription: "Hehe... Now that you've finally fallen into my hands, why don't we take the day to get to know each other real well, Commander?" Oh my, was my acting a bit too realistic~?
skins.acquisition: "Hehe... Now that you've finally fallen into my hands, why don't we take the day to get to know each other real well, Commander?" Oh my, was my acting a bit too realistic~?
skins.login: How's it going, Commander? It might be unprofessional of me to ask, but... Is something up?
skins.details: My feelings for you haven't changed, but yeah, these clothes make me act really intimidating... Maybe I'm getting into my role too much.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let's take a ride to the party. Don't worry about the Manjuu, I've seen how well he can drive... What, that wasn't your concern?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You oughta take today off at the very least. No need to be a busy bee and work day in, day out.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Mental clarity is the key to keeping your cool on the battlefield. My sisters, they all have the fortitude it takes.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: "Looks like someone here doesn't know proper manners."

skins.shipDescription: I heard that this place is famous for its festivals with beautiful fireworks, so I made sure to come dressed for the occasion... What do you think? ...I'm even more beautiful? Well, I couldn't let the fireworks be the only things leaving an impression upo
skins.acquisition: I heard that this place is famous for its festivals with beautiful fireworks, so I made sure to come dressed for the occasion... What do you think? ...I'm even more beautiful? Well, I couldn't let the fireworks be the only things leaving an impression upo
skins.login: There you are, Commander! They're putting on a fireworks display tonight. Come with me and we'll check it out.
skins.details: Beauty is fleeting. Look away for one moment, and you'll miss it forever... It's not exclusive to fireworks, either. When you see a thing of beauty, keep your eyes on it, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even in the cold winter, the thrill of watching fireworks with your friends warms you up. Ahahahah!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Being here with my sisters, us all watching the fireworks together... It's actually pretty nice.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Seeing these stunning fireworks makes me hope next year wi
skins.secretaryTouch: Fancy my dress? You can have a closer look at it all you want later.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...You wanna make like a firework and go bang, or what?
